metadata.default_value: By default, the `--bind-address` parameter is set to 0.0.0.0
metadata.name: Ensure that the --bind-address argument is set to 127.0.0.1
metadata.description: Do not bind the scheduler service to non-loopback insecure addresses.
metadata.rationale:
The Scheduler API service which runs on port 10251/TCP by default is used for health and metrics information and is available without authentication or encryption.
As such it should only be bound to a localhost interface, to minimize the cluster's attack surface
metadata.audit:
Run the following command on the Control Plane node:

```
ps -ef | grep kube-scheduler
```

Verify that the `--bind-address` argument is set to 127.0.0.1
metadata.remediation: Edit the Scheduler pod specification file `/etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml` on the Control Plane node and ensure the correct value for the `--bind-address` parameter
